text.autoconfig.brb.title: Better Recipe Book Config
text.autoconfig.brb.option.settingsButto:
§d--- Advanced ---
§eForge Warning: §7If you disable either of these two options, you will have to edit them in the brb.toml file to access this menu again!
On fabric, you may use §bMod Menu§r to get here.
text.autoconfig.brb.option.scrolling.scr: When you reach the end of the book, wrap back and keep scrolling from the start (Like JEI)
text.autoconfig.brb.option.scrolling.ena: Enable Scrolling in the Recipe Book
text.autoconfig.brb.option.alternativeRe: Only show alternate's recipe on hover
Show the item in the alternatives list instead of their recipe so its easy to see
text.autoconfig.brb.option.newRecipes.un: Requires world/server re-join to take effect
text.autoconfig.brb.option.newRecipes.en: Enable the little bounce animation when you unlock a new item
